mainTitle.title: Let's complete your purchase
mainTitle.subtitle: Almost there! Review your billing info and payment method details.

checkoutAccordion.enterBillingInfoSubtitle: This is the information we use to calculate tax and send invoices for all your subscriptions.

firstName.invalid: Please use only letters, hyphens, and apostrophes

lastName.invalid: Please use only letters, hyphens, and apostrophes

address1.invalid: Address can include alphanumeric characters and punctuation.

address2.invalid: Address can include alphanumeric characters and punctuation.

countryCode.required: Please select a country from the list.

state.required: Please select a state from the list.

city.invalid: City name should only contain letters and apostrophes.

zipCode.required: Please enter a valid postal / Zip code.
zipCode.invalid: Please enter a valid postal / Zip code.

vatNumber.invalid: Please enter a valid VAT number / Tax ID.

summary.title: Summary
summary.upgradeSubtractedCost: We've subtracted the remaining value of your current plan from the cost of this upgrade.
summary.upgradeNextCycleAmount: Your new billing cycle starts today, in your next billing cycle you'll pay the full {amount} / year + sales tax / VAT.
summary.legalText: By purchasing, you acknowledge that your subscription will be renewed annually, unless you switch to manual renewal.
summary.ioLegalText: By purchasing Image Optimizer by Elementor, you agree to our <0>Image Optimizer Terms & Conditions</0>
summary.siteMailerLegalText: By purchasing Site Mailer by Elementor, you agree to our <0>Site Mailer Terms & Conditions</0>
summary.appAccessLegalText: By purchasing Accessibility by Elementor, you agree to our <0>Accessibility Terms & Conditions</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1>
summary.priceDisclaimerText: Unless specified otherwise, all $ prices are in USD
summary.ILSLegalText: If your subscription was originally purchased in USD, you can switch to ILS by contacting support. Current ILS pricing is on our <0>pricing page.</0>

footer.moneyBack: 30-day money back guarantee for Pro or Hosting plans only
30-day money back guarantee for Pro or Hosting plans only
footer.protectedBy: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google <0>Privacy Policy</0> and <1>Terms of Service</1> apply.

paymentFailed.title: Payment failed.
paymentFailed.subtitle: Sorry, we are unable to process your payment at this time. Please try again later.

promoCodes.invalid: The promo code you entered is invalid.
promoCodes.generalError: There was an issue with the promo code. Please try again or contact support.

thankYou.title: Thank you for your purchase {firstName}!
thankYou.subtitle: Once the receipt is ready, we will send it to {email} with the next steps.
